Html:
Hey guys,

I am using Touchless for webcam handling. I would like to know if there is a way to get the list of supported resolutions of the webcam with touchless and if there is a way to change the capture resolution.

Many thanks

Peter

Hi Peter,

Unforutunately, right now there is no way to change the webcam resolution.

Hopefully that feature will work it's way into Touchless in the coming months.

*Touchless is looking for contributors!*

- Mike
